title: Ascension Game Mode Rewards still not received.
body: During ascension, you could get 4 icons. 3 if you won 1, 3, and/or 5 times. and the 4th icon for if you won with your team having all the ascensions and the enemy team having none. I played one and won it and only my team had ascensions and we all had one. enemy team had none. I still have not received the 2 icons though.

replies.body:
Ahhhh you're referring to the [**Shurima Event**](http://promo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/shurima/index.html#rewards) we did a couple years ago when we first released the Ascension game mode. Sadly, those icons were only given out during the event, which ended in Sept of 2015. 

I went ahead and double checked for those matches to see if you qualified, but I'm only seeing one match played which was this year when it was in the rotating game mode. Since this account didn't play during the event, we won't be able to give out those icons anymore.
